title: Bowser

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Flame Breath**: Rampage attack a player, Torching the main target, Can only be used on night 3, 6, 9 and so on.
- **Ground Pound** (1x): Roleblock all players tonight, Koopas aren't affected by this.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock Immunity while Breathing flames.
- Gain 1 ammo for **Ground Pound** on the start of day 5.
